<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 292 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1 cp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A torch sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet) for 1 hour. It can be used as an improvised weapon that deals 1d4 bludgeoning damage plus 1 fire damage.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Torch
